♦️ Italy’s president rejects an offer by Mario Draghi to resign as prime minister.
♦️ Rishi Sunak tops the second round of voting in Britain’s Conservative Party leadership contest.
♦️ New figures show the toll of lockdowns on China’s economy.
Catch up on today’s news 👇
